name: Little Civilizations
description:
Became the nurturing god of newborn culture. Choose how to guide & help them.

Within seconds, see them grow and evolve from the spears of the stone age to the nuclear weapons of today.

Will your tribe rise triumphant from the ashes of war or they vanish into the sands of time? It’s all on you, so choose carefully! The fate of your little civilization is in your hands!
